snippet.title: Cannon Fighter/キャノン・ファイター (MSX, 1984, Policy)
snippet.description: This is Cannon Fighter/キャノン・ファイター for MSX and the game has you taking the role of a solider using the cannon to shoot at oncoming tanks that shot at the barrier and planes that will fly over. Once all the black tanks are gone you now have to stop a blue tank that avoids your attacks by going up or down when position at a point you can shot. You need to trick it to get a bonus of 1000 points. If the tanks are near you have to move to a wall which increases the amount of black and blue tanks that will appear. They'll shot parts of the defense and when they shoot you. A cannon and life are gone but for every 10000 points you receive an extra. This is a fun war game to play on the MSX as it might be the semi early
